pages.text: Here you find usefull infos that avoid freezing & burning to death.
First read these 2 Entries to learn the differences between Environment and Body Temperature.

pages.title: Too Hot?
pages.text: $(li)Wear no Armor$(li)Avoid direct Sunlight$(li)Drink $(l:patchouli:get_started/water_entry)Water$(/l) & Drinks$(li)Use Ice Packs

pages.title: Too Cold?
pages.text: $(li)Stay near heat source's$(li)Use Heating Stones$(li)Wear Wolf or Leather Armor$(li)Insulate Armor with:$(li2)Mammoth Fur$(li2)Polar Bear Fur$(li2)Bear Fur
Use the $(l)Stoncutter$() & Cleanstone to get them.$(br2)Enchant them with:$(li)Durability$(li)Mending.
